code: import React from'react';import Swal from'sweetalert2';import'./Contacts.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Contacts=()=>{const onSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();const formData=new FormData(event.target);formData.append("access_key","8f3cb066-6bc3-4797-ad5c-2c7ac02c44ea");const object=Object.fromEntries(formData);const json=JSON.stringify(object);const res=await fetch("https://api.web3forms.com/submit",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Accept:"application/json"},body:json}).then(res=>res.json());if(res.success){Swal.fire({title:'Success!',text:'Message sent successfully',icon:'success'});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"contacts",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"contacts-form",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:onSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"contact-title",children:"Contattaci"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Nome e cognome"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"field",placeholder:"Enter your name",name:"name ",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"field",placeholder:"Enter your email",name:"email",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Il tuo messaggio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"message",className:"field mess",placeholder:"Enter your message",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Send Message"})]})})});};export default Contacts;
